Posts.EditableText: Hello, I think this program looks really cool. I am interested in  more of a randomly generated quest program though. Does anyone have one in mind? or is there a way this could work for me?
Posts.HTML: Hello, I think this program looks really cool. I am interested in more of a randomly generated quest program though. Does anyone have one in mind? or is there a way this could work for me?

Posts.EditableText:
My game Deeper is a randomly generated dungeon (the three locations above ground are hard-coded; everything else is generated at random on the fly), so it is certainly possible. What exactly are you trying to do?
http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/em15b32xd0o-y-ysvgrtcg/deeper
